mapper.select: select boardno, userid, productno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, borgimg, bsaveimg, bimgtype, bcount from productreviews order by boardno desc

select count(*) from productreviews, products where productreviews.productno = products.productno
and userid like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and products.pname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and (btitle like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or bcontent like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
mapper.update: update productreviews set bcount=bcount+1 where boardno=#{boardno}

insert.if: insert into productreviews (boardno, userid, productno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bcount) values (seq_preview_boardno.nextval, #{userid}, #{productno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, 0)

insert into productreviews (boardno, userid, productno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, borgimg, bsaveimg, bimgtype, bcount) values (seq_preview_boardno.nextval, #{userid}, #{productno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, #{borgimg}, #{bsaveimg}, #{bimgtype}, 0)

mapper.select: select distinct o.userid from orders o, orderproducts op where o.orderno=op.orderno and op.productno=#{productno} and o.ostatus='배송완료'
